data.title: [Solved] Which singer entered the Guinness World Records for the most
data.meta_description:
The correct answer is Option 1, i.e Asha Bhosale.


	Legendary Bollywood playback singer Asha Bhosle has entered the Guinness World Records for the most number
data.text:
-> The RRB ALP Recruitment 2024 Application Status has been activated. Candidates can view it by logging in with their user credentials.

-> The candidates whose applications have been provisionally accepted with or without conditions can exercise the modify option during the modification window from 29-07-2024 to 07-08-2024 by logging in with their user credentials.

-> The Notification 2024 has been released for 18799 vacancies of the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) post.

-> The RRB ALP CBT 1 will be scheduled between June to August 2024. The CBT 2 will be held in September 2024.

->The candidates must have passed 10th with ITI or Diploma to be eligible for this post.

->The RRB Assistant Loco Pilot selection process comprises CBT I, CBT II, Computer Based Aptitude Test (CBAT), Document Verification, and Medical Examination.
